tool_description: Monitors air quality metrics against configurable thresholds and generates violation alerts when limits are exceeded.

current_value.description: Current metric value to check against thresholds

metric_type.description: Type of metric: temperature, humidity, co2, pm25, pm10, voc, formaldehyde

error_messages: Invalid metric type: Use one of [temperature, humidity, co2, pm25, pm10, voc, formaldehyde].
Invalid threshold values: warning_threshold and critical_threshold must be valid numbers when provided.
Invalid direction: check_direction must be 'above', 'below', or 'both'.
Threshold logic error: critical_threshold should be more extreme than warning_threshold.
usage: Provide current_value and metric_type, optionally set warning_threshold and critical_threshold with appropriate check_direction.

violation_type.description: Type of violation if any: none, warning_exceeded, critical_exceeded

threshold_crossed.description: Value of threshold that was crossed, if any
